attributes.action: DON'T have a second EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details: After the Vote Leave side were victorious in the EU referendum, the Remain side have been calling for a second one, in the hope that they'll win this time. Not only is it going against a democratically elected decision, but it is also a waste of time & money to do so, considering the results will most likely be the same.
attributes.background: We are asking the government not to consider having a second referendum, as it goes against a democratic decision & is a complete waste of time.
